sys_script_include.description: Sends an email if the supplied params object contains non-empty values for "subject", "body" and "recipients" and if the "glide.email.smtp.active" system property is set to true. The default sender name is defined in the system property "glide.email.username". It can be set using the "from" value in the params object.
sys_script_include.name: SendMail
